```{r include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
```

# Load data

```{r}
df_comp <- read_csv('out/df_comp.csv')
df_comp
```

# Processing status

```{r}
df_comp %>%
  select(LEMMA, SUBSET, STAMP) %>%
  filter(SUBSET == 'full') %>%
  mutate(STAMP = as_datetime(STAMP)) %>%
  arrange(desc(STAMP))
```


# Degree centrality

```{r}
df_comp %>%
  select(LEMMA, SUBSET, USES, CENT_DEGREE) %>%
  filter(SUBSET == 'full') %>%
  arrange((CENT_DEGREE))
```
